title: Daniel Jones
subtitle: CEO at Open Languages
text: We hired Alexander to develop from scratch a complete system administrator company wide portal to enable our back office to process and manage sensitive data for teachers, students and classes. Alexander was also hired to further enhance our virtual classroom front-end for students an application that he previously developed for us. Alexander has once again proven his unique ability to develop at the highest level possible innovative Internet base software solutions. We will continue to work with him and can highly recommend him to anyone seeking a highly skilled web developer.
